short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mountains Tab is a Chrome Extension for the New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a stunning mountains related background in every new tab.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Mountains Tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://hociosoft.com/terms/ and Policy https://hociosoft.com/privacy/

This extension changes your existing new tab page and changing the search engine in the new tab to Microsoft Bing and provides the features below:
- Clean new tab look
- Date and time
- Changing mountains related backgrounds
- Popular useful links
- Convenient web search powered by Microsoft Bing search results. With it, you can easily search for your favorite topics, images, videos, and news

This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.

Please review our Privacy Policy for details regarding the information we collect when you install and use the extension.
 
For more information please check:

Terms of Service:
https://hociosoft.com/terms/

Privacy Policy:
